summary.para: Creates an instance of the capture engine.

param.name: clsid
param.para: The CLSID of the object to create.
Currently, this parameter must equal CLSID_MFCaptureEngine.

param.name: riid
param.para: The IID of the requested interface. The capture engine supports the interface.

param.name: ppvObject
param.para: Receives a pointer to the requested interface. The caller must release the interface.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: Before calling this method, call the function.

summary.para: Creates an instance of the capture engine.

remarks.para: To get a pointer to this interface, call the CoCreateInstance function and specify the CLSID equal to CLSID_MFCaptureEngineClassFactory.
Calling the MFCreateCaptureEngine function is equivalent to calling .
